message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $110. It's a great deal for a high-quality item! Let me know if you're interested.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the high-quality product, but I can only pay up to $90 for it. Looking forward to your response.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $90 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $95. This is a fair price considering the product's value. Let me know if you're interested.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I'm willing to pay $92 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
